text: Dang ping'an huo kongju de xiaoxi daoda tamen shi, tamen bian sichu chuanbo. Jiaru tamen zhi ba ta baogao gei shizhe [mu sheng] he tamen zhong de zhangquan zhe, name, shanyu diaocha zhe biding cong tamen [zhijie] zhi dao ta. Jiaru meiyou an la dui nimen de enhui he ci min, name, nimen zhong chu shaoshu ren wai biding du zhuisui emole.
